## ðŸ”’ Paid Article (Oct. 23, 2025): The Cost of Care: What SAGE Taught Me About Centralization and Compassion

A Thursday morning emergency visit for Whiskers, my aging schnauzer-poodle, became more than a medical ordeal. It revealed how fragile both life and our economic systems areâ€”and how a decentralized world could let compassion and value flow as freely as breath.
